input: If Jim moves some particles of matter farther apart, what will happen to the rate at which they can pass vibrations on to nearby particles?When particles of matter are closer together, they can more quickly pass the energy of vibrations to nearby particles.

Long ago the surface of Venus warmed enough that greenhouse gases escaped from the atmosphere. As a result, the greenhouse effect on that planetAn increase in greenhouse gases leads to greater greenhouse effect.

If less waters falls on an area of land it will cause _____ plants to grow in that area?As more water covered the land, sand and silt were washed in and covered the dead vegetation, enabling more and more plants to grow.

Rich applies a solution to the dish that increases the turgor pressure of the guard cells he is studying. The stomataThe increase in turgor pressure of the guard cells results in the opening up of the stomata which results in increased transpiration.

Simon was digging in his yard and found that the rocks that were deeper in the ground, compared to the surface rocks, were likelyTherefore, deeper rock layers must be older than layers closer to the surface.
If Jim is tuning his shortwave radio and he increases the wavelength, what happens to the frequency?As wavelength increases, frequency decreases.

Dean is trying to slide a rock down a hill using less input force. The slope of the hill that will be ideal for Dean is one that has a slope that isThe more gradual the slope of the inclined plane, the less input force is needed and the greater the mechanical advantage.
Reid is modelling the greenhouse effect in a simulation. If he decreases greenhouse gas levels, the greenhouse gas effect willAn increase in greenhouse gases leads to greater greenhouse effect.
John was looking at sunscreen at the retail store. He noticed that sunscreens that had lower SPF would offer protection that isA sunscreen with a higher SPF protects the skin longer.

Ronald is an electron 20nm from his nucleus. Winnie is an electron 25nm from the nucleus. Who is less attracted to the nucleus?When valence electrons are farther from the nucleus, they are attracted less strongly by the nucleus and more easily removed from the atom.
Dogs, compared to camels, will have differences in their DNA that isThe longer the amount of time since species diverged, the more differences there will be in their DNA or proteins.
The planet gets cooler when there are more or less greenhouse gases?More greenhouse gases trap more heat and warm the atmosphere.
Clare stopped rubbing two sticks together. The sticks becameFriction causes the molecules on rubbing surfaces to move faster, so they have more heat energy.
If particles drift apart, they will pass energy to each otherWhen particles of matter are closer together, they can more quickly pass the energy of vibrations to nearby particles.

Two batteries are sitting on a table, one has energy being passed quickly around, the other has energy passed slowly around. The battery with energy being passed quickly has particles of matter that areWhen particles of matter are closer together, they can more quickly pass the energy of vibrations to nearby particles.
Will drilled 1000 feet to find a rock. Harry picked a rock up off of the ground. Whose rock is likely older?Therefore, deeper rock layers must be older than layers closer to the surface.
In order to take a photo of the flashlight right in front of us we would need our camera's shutter to be openA camera shutter stays open longer in dim light to let more light in.

Simon was digging in his yard and found that the rocks that were shallower in the ground, compared to the surface rocks, were likelyTherefore, deeper rock layers must be older than layers closer to the surface.

What will happen to the acidity of the ocean if production of greenhouse gas is reduced?An increase in greenhouse gases will increase the changes that are already being seen including in ocean acidity.
If there are any waves in the ocean that are very short there will be _____ of themAs wavelength increases, frequency decreases.

Species that diverged more recently than two other species diverged will have _____ differences in their DNA.The longer the amount of time since species diverged, the more differences there will be in their DNA or proteins.
As an object speeds up, it will become _____.At a lower temperature, particles of the medium are moving more slowly, so it takes them longer to transfer the energy of the sound waves.
As Wren hugged her boyfriend, the gravitational pull was _____.The gravitational force increases with mass and decreases with the distance between the bodies.

Jason fills up a balloon with helium. After a while, he decides to fill a smaller balloon with the helium with the balloon. The gas in the smaller balloon will have a density that isIf we take a certain amount of gas from one container and place it into another, larger container, the gas expandsto fill the larger container. The same mass of gas is now in a larger volume, the gas now has a lower density.
If the mass of an object gets smaller what will happen to the amount of matter contained within it?The greater the mass of an object, the more matter it contains.

When two things are not attracted to each other what are their energy levels?Places where particles of a medium crowd closer together are called compressions, and places where the particles spread farther apart are called rarefactions. The more energy the wave has, the closer together the particles are in compressions and the farther apart they are in rarefactions.
If Jim decreases the amount of energy in the sound wave he is producing, the particles inside the water he is screaming intoThe more energy the wave has, the farther the particles of the medium move.
What would happen to Earth's atmosphere if the amount of greenhouse gases in it was decreased?More greenhouse gases trap more heat and warm the atmosphere.
Dell added very little silica to her magma project. The magma will be _____ in color.Magmas that produce lighter colored minerals are higher in silica.
If Milo wants to decrease the rate at which his bonfire is burning, what should he do to the temperature?When the temperature of reactants is higher, the rate of the reaction is faster.

The same mass of gas is now in a larger volume, the gas now has a lower density.

If Mary is taking a picture and she shuts the camera shutter narrower what will happen to the amount of light that gets in?A camera shutter stays open longer in dim light to let more light in.

Carla is pushing two carts down a street. One cart is heavy, the other is light. The heavy cart, compared to the light one, will accelerateThe greater the mass of an object, the less it will accelerate when a given force is applied.

Carey watched the air cleaner sucking smoke into a container, leaving the garage. The smoke had _____ density now.If we take a certain amount of gas from one container and place it into another, larger container, the gas expandsto fill the larger container. The same mass of gas is now in a larger volume, the gas now has a lower density.

Dean is trying to slide a rock down a hill using more input force. The slope of the hill that will be ideal for Dean is one that has a slope that isThe more gradual the slope of the inclined plane, the less input force is needed and the greater the mechanical advantage.

As an emergency improvisation to decrease the resistance of a circuit as much as possible, and assuming each were made of the same material, would it be better to useThe shorter the resistor, the less resistance it has.
output: a paperclip bent to its maximum length?
options: a metal coat hanger bent to its maximum length
a paperclip bent to its maximum length?

input: Will cut up big pieces of butter in the pan. These pieces dissolve _____ easily than small pieces.Smaller pieces dissolve more easily.

Don wants to be able to melt butter quickly. He starts with a small chunk of it, and it melts very slowly. Dan combines the butter in order to do this with the surface areaAs rock breaks into smaller pieces, the surface area of the pieces increases.
A piece of wire that is long will have _____ resistance than one that is very long.The shorter the resistor, the less resistance it has.
A car that is very heavy will accelerateThe greater the mass of an object, the less it will accelerate when a given force is applied.

If you fill a large canister with gas from a smaller canister will the densityIf we take a certain amount of gas from one container and place it into another, larger container, the gas expandsto fill the larger container. The same mass of gas is now in a larger volume, the gas now has a lower density.

Olive and Jean were collecting rocks during a hike, they collected too many rocks so the two girls decided to leave some rocks behind to come back to later. Olive decided to bury her rocks in the dirt, and Jean decided to leave hers in a ditch in the sun. When they returned a week later, which girl's rocks changed the least?With more surfaces of the rocks exposed, there are more places for chemical weathering to occur.

Compared to a wave in the ocean, would a ripple in a pond caused by a drop of rain havePlaces where particles of a medium crowd closer together are called compressions, and places where the particles spread farther apart are called rarefactions. The more energy the wave has, the closer together the particles are in compressions and the farther apart they are in rarefactions.
output: more closely spaced particles in its rarefactions?
options: more closely spaced particles in its rarefactions?
more distantly spaced particles in its rarefactions

input: Two batteries are sitting on a table, one has energy being passed quickly around, the other has energy passed slowly around. The battery with energy being passed slowly has particles of matter that areWhen particles of matter are closer together, they can more quickly pass the energy of vibrations to nearby particles.

Hassan and Ratna each received new automatic cameras as presents. To test their new cameras, Hassan took a picture of the beach that afternoon, while Ratna waited until it was dark outside to take a picture of a python in the moonlight. The shutter of whose camera stayed open shorter?A camera shutter stays open longer in dim light to let more light in.

Evan weighs 200 pounds while Sasha weighs 100 pounds. Who flies the shortest distance when pushed off the diving board?The greater the mass of an object, the less it will accelerate when a given force is applied.
Will has two balls and pushed them closer to each other. The gravitational force between the ballsThe gravitational force increases with mass and decreases with the distance between the bodies.
When viewing the climate model John saw that the more gases were in the atmosphere, the heat would beMore greenhouse gases trap more heat and warm the atmosphere.
Willard dug up a rock from near the surface, and realized it was _____.Therefore, deeper rock layers must be older than layers closer to the surface.
The the planets are colder than sun because they areAn object with more mass has greater thermal energy than an object with less mass because it has more atoms.

If Mona's kidneys are not working correctly and less water is removed from her blood, what will happen to the tint of her blood?If the kidneys remove less water from the blood, the blood will look darker, because there is less water in it.

If Mona is observing two objects and she realizes that one has a larger mass then the other, what does that tell her about that object's thermal energy?An object with more mass has greater thermal energy than an object with less mass because it has more atoms.

One side effect of driving cars is the production of greenhouse gases. If fewer cars are put on the roads, what would happen to the greenhouse effect on the Earth's atmosphere?An increase in greenhouse gases leads to greater greenhouse effect.

If Jim moves some particles of matter closer together, what will happen to the rate at which they can pass vibrations on to nearby particles?When particles of matter are closer together, they can more quickly pass the energy of vibrations to nearby particles.
Milo was moving some metal balls around. If he were to move the balls closer together, what would happen to the force of gravity?Objects that are closer together have a stronger force of gravity.
A sensor on a camera that is smaller will haveThe larger the light collecting area, the more light a telescope gathers and the higher resolution (ability to see fine detail) it has.
The reason that things rotate around the sun is because it isThe greater the mass of the objects, the stronger the gravitational force of attraction between them.

If planet W and planet X have a combined mass that is twice that of the combined mass of planet Y and planet Z, the gravitational force between planets Y and Z will be _____ that of W and X.The greater the mass of the objects, the stronger the gravitational force of attraction between them.
Considering that aluminum has a much lower specific heat than water, which would cool more slowlyThe land heats up and cools off faster than the water because it has lower specific heat.
output: five pounds of water heated to 200 degrees?
options: five pounds of water heated to 200 degrees?
a five pound block of aluminum heated to 200 degrees

input: Jim is comparing two cells. One seems to have more activity then the other. Will the cell exhibiting less activity haveCells that are very active would typically have more mitochondria than cells that are less active.

If planet W and planet X have a combined mass that is half that of the combined mass of planet Y and planet Z, the gravitational force between planets Y and Z will be _____ that of W and X.The greater the mass of the objects, the stronger the gravitational force of attraction between them.

Will was lifting weights at the gym. The force of gravity between him and a 20 pound weight is likely _____ than that between him and a 45 pound weight.The greater the mass of the objects, the stronger the gravitational force of attraction between them.
If Jim wants to find a greater concentration of old fossil water he needs to move _____ into an aquifer?Deeper aquifers typically contain older 'fossil water.'
Compared to the dawn of time, the variety between species now isThe longer the amount of time since species diverged, the more differences there will be in their DNA or proteins.

Will plays with an adjustable ramp for his cars. He sets the angle at 25 degrees and then at 15 degrees. Which ramp angle requires less input force on the cars?The more gradual the slope of the inclined plane, the less input force is needed and the greater the mechanical advantage.
In order to take a photo of the stars far away we would need our camera's shutter to be openA camera shutter stays open longer in dim light to let more light in.
Which planet has the least gravity exerted on it from the Sun?Objects that are closer together have a stronger force of gravity.

When you get further from the sun are planets more or less attracted to the sun?When valence electrons are farther from the nucleus, they are attracted less strongly by the nucleus and more easily removed from the atom.

Don is watching rocks be eroded by water. Since the water is moving so fast and hard, Don can tell that the particles being carried away by the water areIn erosion, the more energy the water has, the larger the particle it can carry.

If Milo is growing some plants in his garden and he accidentally coats them with something that increases their sheen, what happens to their reflectivity?Increases the sheen on leaves to make them more reflective.

Long ago the surface of Venus warmed enough that greenhouse gases escaped into the atmosphere. As a result, the greenhouse effect on that planetAn increase in greenhouse gases leads to greater greenhouse effect.
